data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: We are teaching the students in the first grade class about spelling this week. They ____ going ____ learn ____ to ____ their ____, ____ the ____ of a friend. We ____ prepared ____ colored ____ for ____ to ____ with. Learning how to spell doesn't have to be boring.
data.partBlankContent: We are teaching the students in the first grade class about spelling this week. They a__ going t_ learn h__ to sp___ their na___, a__ the na___ of a friend. We ha__ prepared b__ colored let____ for th__ to pl__ with. Learning how to spell doesn't have to be boring.
data.fullContent: We are teaching the students in the first grade class about spelling this week. They are going to learn how to spell their names, and the names of a friend. We have prepared big colored letters for them to play with. Learning how to spell doesn't have to be boring.
data.answer: 这周我们正在教一年级的学生拼写。他们将学习如何拼写自己的名字，以及一个朋友的名字。我们准备了大的彩色字母让他们玩。学习拼写不一定是无聊的。
